root.name: Table Top Tanks
root.description: OverviewTable Top Tanks is a vehicular combat game developed by Devil's Details and published by Sony for the PlayStation Vita platform.Game ModesSolo ChallengesVarious single player challenges to train you to play the game. They include learning how to maneuver your tank, target practice, learning how to use air support, and more.Multiplayer ModeThis game allows for local multiplayer. All players gather around the same AR cards and can play:Capture the Flag - Tanks fight to capture enemy flags and return them to their respective bases.Two vs. Two - Table Top Tank's version of team death match.Last Man Standing - Be the one to survive, don't run out of lives!Solo CreatorCreate custom games and fight AI tanks in the various multiplayer modes.
